content:
In Kryvyi Rih, as a result of the rocket attack of the Russian Federation, the number of dead increased to 3, 38 people were injured.

About thisreportedMinistry of Internal Affairs Igor Klimenko.

There are affected children. However, these figures are not final, because search and rescue work is ongoing.

SES, police, indifferent residents save blocked people from apartments and continue to search for those who can be rubbed. 4 people have already been saved.

Head of Dnipropetrovsk Ova Sergey Lisakaddedthat is now known about 10 children who have suffered as a result of a hostile attack on Kryvyi Rih.

ForinformationThe Ministry of Internal Affairs, two dwellings in different areas have been destroyed. There were fires in the homes, which were eliminated by SES employees.

The destruction of the roof, walls and balconies, the apartments are knocked out windows, a damaged car.

Police help to disassemble the gaps, evacuate residents from smoky and damaged homes. Along with the shelling places, mobile points have been launched, receiving citizens' appeals.

As reported by the Armyinform, as a result of the Russian attack in Kryvyi Rih on Tuesday nightThere are deadBut the victims.
title: The number of deaths in Kryvyi Rih increased to 3, among the wounded - 10 children
description: This was reported by the Ministry of Internal Affairs Igor Klimenko. There are affected children. However, these numbers are not ...
author: Army Inform
